department: Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada
short_summary: IT support services with a specialization in Microsoft SharePoint
description: Public Safety Canada requires the provision of IT support services with a specialization in Microsoft SharePoint to support SharePoint-based portals as described in this Statement of Work. The Contractor must also provide support for Ersi ArcGIS software (online and server) as the two portals are reliant upon ArcGIS for a key functionality of their applications.

full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: SharePoint Applications Development and Support**
============================================================

**Reference:** PW-23-01030003

**Publication Date:** March 14, 2023

**Close Date:** April 26, 2023 @ 2:00 PM (CST)

**Background:**
---------------

Public Safety Canada is seeking a contractor to provide IT support services for Microsoft SharePoint-based portals. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing ongoing services, including production support and maintenance, as well as additional as-and-when services.

**Scope of Work:**
-----------------

The contractor will be required to provide the following services:

* Ongoing Services: Production Support and Maintenance (24/7)
* As-and-When Services: Application Development and Enhancements, Onboarding New Members
* Security Requirements: Reliability Status

**Contract Duration:**
--------------------

The contract will commence on the date of contract award and will expire on May 31, 2026.

**Optional Services:**
----------------------

Canada has an irrevocable option to acquire the services described in Annex A of the contract for two (2) optional one-year periods. The option may be exercised by the Contracting Authority at any time before the expiry of the contract.

**Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology:**
----------------------------------------------

The evaluation process will be based on a combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).

**Terms and Conditions:**
-------------------------

The successful contractor will be required to sign a contract amendment to activate the optional services.

**Attachments:**
---------------

Please note that the attachments listed below are available on the Canada Buys website for review.

* Intend to Bid - RFP 202301512 - SharePoint Services (English and French)
* Amendment 2 - Canadabuys - RFP - OB 202301512 - Ocip SharePoint Services (English)
* Amendment 1 - Canadabuys - RFP - OB 202301512 - Ocip SharePoint Services (English)
* QS and A 1 - Canadabuys - RFP-OB 202301512 - Ocip SharePoint Services (English)
* QS and A 2 - Canadabuys - RFP - OB 202301512 - Ocip SharePoint Services (English)

**Contact Information:**
-----------------------

For any further information or clarification regarding this RFP, please contact:

* Chantale Gregoire
* E-mail: [chantale.gregoire@canada.ca](mailto:
